item.title: No, Trump Wasn’t Just ‘Dark’
item.description: The media deliberately missed a key element of the Trump phenomenon.

item.title: You Did This to Yourselves, Democrats
item.description: Democrats made a lot of bad choices that drove voters away. That’s how ordinary Americans ended up bringing back Donald Trump.

item.title: California Municipalities Dodge a Fiscal Bullet
item.description: Voters roundly rejected a proposal to make it easier to pass bond initiatives.
